name: Francis Crimmins
tagline: I specialise in combining ideas from the research and open source worlds to create new products and systems.
body:
## Summary
Senior Software Engineer.

I specialise in combining ideas from the research and open source worlds to create new products and systems. I have designed and developed a 100 million page web crawler, recommender systems, a program for detecting "spikes" and related queries in search engine logs and a text miner for definitions from web pages.

## Sample Work

### Recommender Systems
![StackoverFlow Recommender Screenshot](../images/stackoverflow-similar-items.png)

## Key Skills
* Information Retrieval & Search
* Data Mining
* Analytics
* Distributed Systems
* NoSQL
* Relational Databases
* API Design
* Java

## Education
* M.Sc. in Information Retrieval, [Dublin City University](http://dcu.ie/computing/index.shtml) (1996 - 1998)
* B.Sc. in Computer Applications, Dublin City University (1992 - 1996)

## Contact
* Email: francis.crimmins @ gmail.com
* LinkedIn: [https://www.linkedin.com/in/franciscrimmins](https://www.linkedin.com/in/franciscrimmins)
